name: Marchland
description:
Marchland is a strategy board game where players collect cards and compete to claim regions, connecting them to expand their territory and become the most powerful empire in the land.

Players take turns to collect cards of various types, and use them to claim regions - earning more points for claiming larger regions, connecting regions across the map, and taking control of clusters of neighbouring regions.

Music by Jack King-Spooner

Art by Glitchirs and Janette Ramos (Imaginaires)

Created by Glitchirs
